/* ArticleMapper.ListArticle */
SELECT A.ARTICLE_ID, A.ARTICLE_TITLE, A.ARTICLE_WRITER_ID, A.ARTICLE_WRITER_NICKNAME, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CO_USER_ROLE UR WHERE UR.USER_ID = E.USER_ID AND UR.ROLE_ID = 'ROLE_SYSTEM_ADMIN' ) AS IS_SYSTEM_ADMIN, CASE WHEN DATE(A.CREATE_DT) = DATE(SYSDATE()) THEN DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DT, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') END AS CREATE_DT FROM CO_ARTICLE A LEFT JOIN CO_BOARD B ON B.BOARD_ID = A.BOARD_ID LEFT JOIN HM_EMPLOYEE E ON E.USER_ID = A.ARTICLE_WRITER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND B.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.BOARD_ID = @BoardId
ORDER BY A.CREATE_DT DESC

/* ArticleMapper.ListPrevNextArticle */
SELECT B.ARTICLE_ID, B.BOARD_ID, B.ARTICLE_TITLE, B.PREV_NEXT_FLAG FROM CO_ARTICLE A INNER JOIN ( (SELECT ARTICLE_ID, BOARD_ID, ARTICLE_TITLE, 'PREV' AS PREV_NEXT_FLAG FROM CO_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_ID < @ArticleId AND BOARD_ID = @BoardId AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DT DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT ARTICLE_ID, BOARD_ID, ARTICLE_TITLE, 'NEXT' AS PREV_NEXT_FLAG FROM CO_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_ID > @ArticleId AND BOARD_ID = @BoardId AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DT LIMIT 1) ) B ON B.ARTICLE_ID = A.ARTICLE_ID

/* ArticleMapper.GetArticle */
SELECT A.ARTICLE_ID, A.BOARD_ID, A.ARTICLE_TITLE, A.ARTICLE_CONTENT, A.ARTICLE_WRITER_ID, A.ARTICLE_WRITER_NICKNAME, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CO_USER_ROLE UR WHERE UR.USER_ID = E.USER_ID AND UR.ROLE_ID = 'ROLE_SYSTEM_ADMIN' ) AS IS_SYSTEM_ADMIN, CASE WHEN DATE(A.CREATE_DT) = DATE(SYSDATE()) THEN DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DT, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') END AS CREATE_DT FROM CO_ARTICLE A LEFT JOIN HM_EMPLOYEE E ON E.USER_ID = A.ARTICLE_WRITER_ID WHERE A.ARTICLE_ID = @ArticleId

/* ArticleMapper.UpdateArticle */
UPDATE CO_ARTICLE SET ARTICLE_TITLE = @ArticleTitle, ARTICLE_CONTENT = @ArticleContent, UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE ARTICLE_ID = @ArticleId

/* ArticleMapper.RemoveArticle */
UPDATE CO_ARTICLE SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE ARTICLE_ID = @ArticleId
